triggers.name: post_delivery_check
triggers.message_template: Hi {customer_name}! Your {product_name} was delivered yesterday. How is everything? If you have any questions or concerns, I'm here to help!

triggers.name: shipping_delay_detected
triggers.message_template: I noticed your order is running late. The current status is '{tracking_status}'. I'm actively monitoring this and will keep you updated. Would you like me to look into expediting a replacement?

triggers.name: high_return_rate_product
triggers.message_template: Hi {customer_name}! I see you ordered the {product_name}. This item runs {size_tendency}. Your order history shows you typically wear {customer_size_pattern}. Just want to make sure the {ordered_size} will be perfect for you!

triggers.name: first_time_customer
triggers.message_template: Welcome to our community, {customer_name}! Your {product_name} should arrive soon. If you have any questions about sizing, care instructions, or our return policy, I'm here to help!

triggers.name: weather_sensitive_product
triggers.message_template: Your {product_name} is scheduled for delivery during {weather_condition}. The package is weather-protected, but please bring it inside quickly once it arrives!
